sentences.en: A spirit of hopelessness pervaded the country.
sentences.cn: 一种无望的情绪笼罩着该国。

sentences.en: A very real sense of peace seemed to pervade my whole being.
sentences.cn: 一种真正的安详感似乎占据了我整个身心.

sentences.en: According to Spender's research, double standards pervade the classroom.
sentences.cn: 根据斯彭德的研究, 课堂教学普遍实行双重标准.

sentences.en: And networks pervade technology: the Internet, power grids and transportation systems are but a few examples.
sentences.cn: 网络也普遍存在科技之中,像是网际网路 、 电力网及运输系统等等.

sentences.en: Feelings of self confidence, power, and euphoria pervade.
sentences.cn: 自信 、 有力和高亢感漫溢.

sentences.en: Issues around IT governance will pervade the course.
sentences.cn: 课程将围绕资讯技术管理的问题.

sentences.en: Levchenko remarked that a kind of sepulchral quiet seemed to pervade the Residency.
sentences.cn: 在大门旁边的盥洗室里,列夫钦科说情报站里安静得似乎有点阴森森.

sentences.en: Most astronomers believe that large quantities of some unidentified material pervade the universe.
sentences.cn: 多数天文学家相信,宇宙充满了大量的不明物质.

sentences.en: Nano technology will soon pervade the world.
sentences.cn: 奈米科技将很快普及于全世界.

sentences.en: Order, proportion, and fitness pervade the universe.
sentences.cn: 秩序 、 均衡和公理遍及宇宙.

sentences.en: Out of Thy womb the world is born, and Thou it is that dost pervade it.
sentences.cn: 世界从你的子宫诞生, 你又把它遍及所有.

sentences.en: That personality traIt'seems to pervade everything he does.
sentences.cn: 科比所做的每一件事情都体现了他那一性格特点.

words.tran_cn: 无处不在；广泛性；普遍性

trans.tran_en: if a feeling, idea, or smell pervades a place, it is present in every part of it
